name: interpreter_agent
description: Code interpreter agent for executing Python code to solve math, data analysis, and computational problems. Use for ANY calculation - LLMs are bad at math!

query.description: Natural language task description with ALL numbers and context needed for computation. Include specific values, formulas, and expected output format. Example: 'Calculate revenue per employee if total revenue is $100,000 and we have 5 employees. Return as currency.' The agent will generate Python code and execute it.
